QuestData.Title: Relaxation Time!
QuestData.Description:
You there!
You look exhausted. Worn down. In extreme need of some R&R. I have just the thing! The Serene Dreams Spa is the place for you!
Enjoy our new you-ga classes, they are AMAZING! Or perhaps a mud mask facial treatment is more your speed? I recommend both!
To get to the spa, head north just out of the city!
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the Serene Dreams Spa.
QuestData.RewardText: How delightful. I am so glad you're joining us! However, we could really use some help.
